name: Zoop To The Future!  A Point-N-Click Adventure Game
blurb: Join Prickley Pete (a ghost), Joey, and Danny as they travel through time to restore Prickley Pete's timeline!

rewards.reward: "Executive Producer" Credit in the game + Prickley Pete will make you a personalized "Thank You!" video + Exclusive, backer only updates, images, and videos!

Joey, Danny, and Prickley Pete (yes, Prickley Pete) will come to your house, in person, [as long as it is in the Continental US and we can drive there], help you install Zoop To The Future! on the machine (Windows, Mac, Linux) of your choice, and play it (or any other game of equal or lesser hilariousness) along with you until we're all bored!! + We'll eat lots of marshmallows (Prickley Pete's favorite food) and hilarity may ensue + All of the other rewards too! + Even more awesome, limited stuff!! There's no limit here, we'll go on a road trip across the whole USA if we have to, to meet all the awesome people (or peoples) who love Zoop To The Future!
